amendment.description: To require semiannual reports on efforts by the Department of Justice to investigate and prosecute cases of waste, fraud, and abuse related to Federal contracting in Iraq, Afghanistan, and throughout the war on terror.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4266 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4266 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To require semiannual reports on efforts by the Department of Justice to investigate and prosecute cases of waste, fraud, and abuse related to Federal contracting in Iraq, Afghanistan, and throughout the war on terror.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4266 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Harkin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4266 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
